title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4023 - Officials Of The Meeting
content:

State Regulations
§ 4023.1 - Approval by commission
§ 4023.2 - Duties of clerk of the course
§ 4023.3 - Duties of handicapper
§ 4023.4 - Duties of clerk of the scales
§ 4023.5 - Photographs of the finish
§ 4023.6 - Official time
§ 4023.7 - Result of each race to be reported

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 4023

Statutory authority: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and

Breeding Law, §§ 101, 104[1], [19], 128; L. 1982, ch. 865, as
amd

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
